title: Lowering client graphics and disabling unneeded animations for slower computers?
body:
Hello!
Does anyone know of a way to disable the animations in the new client and lower the resolution of some of the client graphics?
I currently have a potato computer and its hard to load up the client and 10/10 times when I queue up the game freezes a lot during queue,champion select phase, and even a player joining the lobby freezes up my client. Any way to disable the unwanted animations would most likely help tremendously as my computer cant render them as fast!

replies.body:
We actually included a nifty little feature in the new client that can do almost exactly what you're asking! If you go into your client settings with the little gear icon in the upper right, there's a new option called Low-Spec Mode which should be able to help you out ^_^!

https://i.gyazo.com/f4081f501e4007d12fae881706a2b4c7.png
I already have that enabled and still continue to face client lags! There's also a weird glitch where I wont be notified that I received a key fragment or chest until I'm in champ select.

> I already have that enabled and still continue to face client lags! There's also a weird glitch where I wont be notified that I received a key fragment or chest until I'm in champ select.

Huh that's pretty weird about your hextech stuff too. It kind of sounds like the hextech part might be related to some hiccups in your network's connection to our servers, so let's go ahead and double check the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
